citeinfo.title: Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) Data Distribution System

descript.abstract: Locations of city and town halls in Rhode Island. Derived using information originally compiled by the State of Rhode Island (http://www.ri.gov), and built upon address location data contributed to the Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) consortium by the Rhode Island Enhanced 911 Uniform Emergency Telephone System (RIE911).
descript.purpose: Support general cartographic and geographic analysis needs.
descript.supplinf: This dataset was developed with support from Broadband Rhode Island (http://broadband.ri.gov).

idinfo.useconst: This dataset is provided 'as is.’ The producer(s) of this dataset, contributors to this dataset, the Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) consortium, the State of Rhode Island, and the University of Rhode Island do not make any warranties of any kind for this dataset, and are not liable for any loss or damage however and whenever caused by any use of this dataset. Please acknowledge both RIGIS and the primary producer(s) of this dataset in any derived products. Versions of the RIGIS logo suitable for both printed and web-based products are available at http://www.rigis.org/logos.

cntorgp.cntorg: University of Rhode Island Environmental Data Center

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3143

attracc.attraccr: Attribute data originally compiled by the State of Rhode Island (http://www.ri.gov/towns). These attribute data were spot-checked and minor corrections made to a few incomplete addresses. No formal attribute accuracy assessment test was performed.

dataqual.logic: No logical consistency tests were performed on this simple point dataset.
dataqual.complete: All 39 municipal seats of government are represented by this dataset. There are no null values present in the attributes.

horizpa.horizpar: No horizontal positional accuracy assessment test was performed. All locations are believed to be within 100 feet of their actual position.

citeinfo.origin: Rhode Island Dept. of Transportation, MIS/GIS Section, Two Capital Hill, Providence, R.I. 02908-5872
citeinfo.title: Rhode Island State, Coastline and Town Boundaries; ritown5k
citeinfo.othercit: Rhode Island state, county, town, and coastline boundaries. Coastline was taken from spring 1997 photography and digitize by Intermap Technologies. state, county, city, and town lines were created by Rhode Island Dept. of Transportation, MIS/GIS Section,Two Capital Hill, Providence, R.I. 02908-5872. Line work was not verified by any state, city, or town agency as to their political or geographic accuracy. Coastline is verified by Intermap Technologies using Spring 1997 aerial photography.

procstep.procdesc: Created blank Excel spreadsheet, began by initially populating with OSP codes and other selected attribute data from the RIGIS ritown5k dataset. Added new Name, Address, Municipality, ZIP, community type, government model, year established, year incorporated, and website fields. Copied address and other attribute data from http://www.ri.gov/towns. Updated incomplete address data for Little Compton, Warren, Westerly. Updated URL's for Coventry, North Providence. Geocoded against RIE911 address location data. Compared locations of city and town halls against prior version of dataset distributed by RIGIS via the "near" ArcGIS command. Reviewed and confirmed significant location differences between the datasets using supplemental information from municipal websites, RIE911 sites data, and Google Street View (when available).

cntorgp.cntorg: University of Rhode Island Environmental Data Center

procstep.procdesc: Data contributed to RIGIS by the University of Rhode Island Environmental Data Center. Metadata were reviewed, minor updates made to content, RIGIS distribution information added.
